name: Phule Harit
description: Phule Harit is an Indian brinjal (eggplant) variety/ hybrid known for good fruit quality, suitable for local cultivation and markets.
soilType: Loamy soil with good drainage and aeration
fertilizer: Balanced NPK (15:15:15) with farmyard manure
notes: Performs well under drip irrigation; susceptible to fruit borer. (Phule Harit)

name: Pant Samrat
description: Pant Samrat is an Indian brinjal (eggplant) variety/ hybrid known for good fruit quality, suitable for local cultivation and markets.
soilType: Fertile clay loam with good water retention
fertilizer: NPK with compost; apply zinc & boron as needed
notes: Hybrid with high yield potential; monitor for viral diseases. (Pant Samrat)
